<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1060</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How Much Should You Eat?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wieviel Sollten Sie Essen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combien Devriez-vous Manger ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quanto Deve Você Comer?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quanto Dovreste Mangiare?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσο θα έπρεπε να φάτε;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuánto Debe Usted Comer?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity the learners will learn about food groups and good eating habits. They will prepare a healthy menu.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food groups</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">good eating habits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">healthy menu.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität erlernen die Anfänger über 
Nahrungsmittelgruppen und gut, Gewohnheiten essend. Sie bereiten
ein gesundes Menü vor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants se renseigneront sur 
des groupes de nourriture et bon mangeant des habitudes. Ils 
prépareront un menu sain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners aprenderão sobre grupos do 
alimento e bom comendo hábitos. Prepararão um menu saudável.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività i principianti impareranno circa i 
gruppi dell'alimento e buon mangiando le abitudini. Prepareranno
un menu sano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα μάθουν για 
τις ομάδες τροφίμων και τις καλές συνήθειες κατανάλωσης. Θα
προετοιμάσουν έναν υγιή κατάλογο επιλογής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes aprenderán sobre 
grupos del alimento y bueno comiendo hábitos. Prepararán un 
menú sano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrungsmittelgruppen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gute Essengewohnheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gesundes Menü.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité interactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">groupes de nourriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bonnes habitudes de manger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">menu sain.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividade interativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">grupos do alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hábitos bons comer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">menu saudável.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività interattiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gruppi dell'alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">buone abitudini di consumo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">menu sano.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική δραστηριότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομάδες τροφίμων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καλές συνήθειες κατανάλωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υγιής κατάλογος επιλογής.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">grupos del alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">buenos hábitos el comer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">menú sano.</string>
          </keyword>
